plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 03-1647

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                      RICHARD P. CALLIPARI,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on May 17, 2004, is amended
as follows:

Page 35, line 12: "supra note 4" should be "supra note 3"
